welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Lewes, a charming town known for its rich history and picturesque landscapes. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all the beauty and culture this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Shoreham Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Shoreham Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the larger of the two terminals and serves both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the smaller of the two terminals and primarily serves international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome serves as the primary hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Redhill Aerodrome offers exclusive services for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
